title: Account Setup Issues
content: [EXPAND: When setting my password, I receive the error "We found some errors. Please review and make corrections."] Issue The sign-in page tells me “We found some errors. Please review and make corrections." Solution Okta does a poor job of informing you that your password does not meet the requirements. Please ensure that the password you’re entering meets the following requirements: If you are still receiving the error after meeting the above requirements, please reach out to the #simpli-okta channel for assistance.
